data.title: Visa’s Investment Shows Plaid Could Replace Libra in Fintech Space
data.text:
Visa and Mastercard have invested in Plaid, hedging their bets that Facebook's Libra could get them into the center of fintech.
The post Visa’s Investment Shows Plaid Could Replace Libra in Fintech Space appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: 3 Big Stock Charts for Tuesday: Southwest Airlines, Visa and Coca-Cola
data.text:
The stock charts of KO, V and LUV may be best positioned for moves in an environment that isn't setting up very many of them.
The post 3 Big Stock Charts for Tuesday: Southwest Airlines, Visa and Coca-Cola appeared first on InvestorPlace.
